/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with bare trees, their leafless branches reaching towards the clear blue sky. The buildings on either side of the street are painted in shades of green and white, adding a touch of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. A red car is seen driving down the street, adding a pop of color to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of natural and man-made elements, creating a serene and picturesque urban landscape.
